thread.title: AMK RESIDENT ASKS FOR FRESH COAT OF PAINT ON SIGNBOARD, TOWN COUNCIL REPLACES IT WITH NEW ONE INSTEAD
thread.title_full: AMK RESIDENT ASKS FOR FRESH COAT OF PAINT ON SIGNBOARD, TOWN COUNCIL REPLACES IT WITH NEW ONE INSTEAD

author: farhan
title: AMK RESIDENT ASKS FOR FRESH COAT OF PAINT ON SIGNBOARD, TOWN COUNCIL REPLACES IT WITH NEW ONE INSTEAD
text:
All Singapore Stuff - Real Singapore News Advertisement AMK RESIDENT ASKS FOR FRESH COAT OF PAINT ON SIGNBOARD, TOWN COUNCIL REPLACES IT WITH NEW ONE INSTEAD   
<Credits: Jmsncy Ng> Advertisement 
Your Ang Mo Kio signpost at many places desperately need a fresh coat of paint. Yes this is a mature estate, but the signpost need not be gray and aged. We are not asking for anything fancy & lavish in these hard times, just some sprucing up will do the trick. 
Ang Mo Kio Town Council responded promptly and wanted to replace the signboard which drew the immediate rebuke from the resident: 
"Dear Jmsncy Ng, Thank you for notifying us about this issue. Could we know the location of this signboard so that our Property Officers can replace this signpost promptly?" 
"We did not ask for a replacement!! Kindly read correctly." Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
